Recipe.Name: Kosha Mangsho

Procedure.string: Put onions, chillies, ginger, and garlic in blender with a bit of water and puree
Combine the lamb, half the puree, turmeric, coriander, and yogurt in a bowl. Season with salt and cover and marinate at least two hours, overnight is preferred.
Transfer remaining puree to a container, rinse blender with a small amount of water, add to container. Chill this while lamb is marinating

When ready to cook, heat sugar in heavy saucepan under high heat until caramelization begins. Add in mustard oil and heat to smoke point. Reduce heat and add in whole spices. When they begin to darken, add in the marinated lamb and fry to seal.

Add the remaining chilled puree and season with salt. Cook over medium heat for 1.5 hours or until meat is tender. Keep adding a little water when the curry dries out. The sauce should eb thing and the oil separated. Season to taste and serve hot, sprinkled with garam masala.
